culture.title: 🥂 调酒文化介绍
content: 调酒，英文叫 "Mixology"，是将不同风味、色彩和质感的酒与配料巧妙结合的艺术。它起源于 19 世纪的欧美社交场所，最初的鸡尾酒大多用于聚会、庆祝和社交活动，后来逐渐发展为一种风味探索和自我表达的方式。
调酒不仅仅是混合饮品，它融合了创意、工艺与文化。每一款鸡尾酒，背后都有属于它的故事和灵感来源。一杯经典的 Mojito，能让你感受到加勒比海的热情；一杯优雅的 Martini，则散发着经典与绅士风范。
今天，调酒已经成为一种独特的生活方式：用心调一杯酒，享受片刻的轻松与愉悦。

basics.title: 🍶 基础调酒知识
materials: 利口酒：如君度橙酒、百利甜、金巴利
果汁：柠檬汁、菠萝汁、橙汁、西柚汁
糖浆：蓝橙糖浆、红石榴糖浆等调味与色彩搭配
装饰：薄荷叶、柠檬片、橙皮卷、透明冰球
techniques: 摇（Shake）：用雪克壶混合出丰富气泡感
搅（Stir）：温和混合，适合烈酒基底
直调（Build）：在杯中直接叠加原料，简单快捷
压泥（Muddle）：释放水果或香草的风味
装饰（Garnish）：点睛之笔，美观又提升风味

tips.title: 🎯 调酒心得总结
content: 🎨 色彩层次：善用糖浆与果汁创造视觉冲击。
🧊 冰块运用：透明冰球不仅降温，还增添观感。
🌿 装饰艺术：薄荷、柠檬片、橙皮等点缀。
📸 记录灵感：拍照记录，积累调酒灵感。
tips.conclusion: 调酒是生活的一种表达方式，每一杯酒都是一段心情的延伸。希望你也能在调酒中找到属于自己的灵感！🥂

culture.title: 🥂 Introduction to Cocktail Culture
content: Mixology is the art of skillfully combining different flavors, colors, and textures of spirits with ingredients. It originated in 19th-century European and American social venues, where cocktails were initially used for parties, celebrations, and social activities, later evolving into a way of flavor exploration and self-expression.

Mixology is not just about mixing drinks; it integrates creativity, craftsmanship, and culture. Behind every cocktail lies its own story and source of inspiration. A classic Mojito can make you feel the passion of the Caribbean; an elegant Martini exudes classic and gentlemanly charm.
Today, mixology has become a unique lifestyle: crafting a drink with care and enjoying moments of relaxation and pleasure.

basics.title: 🍶 Basic Mixology Knowledge
materials: Liqueurs: such as Cointreau, Bailey's, Campari
Juices: lemon juice, pineapple juice, orange juice, grapefruit juice
Syrups: blue curaçao, grenadine for flavor and color combinations
Garnishes: mint leaves, lemon slices, orange peels, clear ice spheres
techniques: Shake: Use a shaker to create rich bubbles
Stir: Gentle mixing, suitable for spirit-based cocktails
Build: Layer ingredients directly in the glass, simple and quick
Muddle: Release flavors from fruits or herbs
Garnish: The finishing touch, beautiful and flavor-enhancing

tips.title: 🎯 Mixology Tips Summary
content: 🎨 Color Layers: Use syrups and juices to create visual impact.
🧊 Ice Usage: Clear ice spheres not only cool but also enhance appearance.
🌿 Garnish Art: Mint, lemon slices, orange peels as embellishments.
📸 Record Inspiration: Take photos to record and accumulate mixology inspiration.
tips.conclusion: Mixology is a way of expressing life, each drink is an extension of a mood. Hope you can also find your own inspiration in mixology! 🥂
